revisionDesc.change: Vote - AcceptText - See Berkes' comments. Otherwise fine.
Vote - AcceptText - l. 3: με ---> <:μοι|reg|με:> l.4: (ἀκτούαρ(ιος)) ---> (ἀκτουάρ(ιος)) (the accent of SB is correct, there is no need to change it.)
Entered Greek text from SB 26.16723. lin2--> doubt whether genitive should not be ἰνδικτίονος; lin3, 4--> skipped dots; lin4--> changed accent ἀκτούαριος (not -oυά-).
AcceptText - Greek recto lin3: no need for grc in the reg => <:στοιχεῖ|reg|στυχῖ:> Coptic Verso lin13 =>13.- ⲣ̣[.1]ⲟ.2ⲣⲓ

AcceptText - Accept text. Greek recto: note that the text is from the SB and not the ed. pr. and includes corrections (from Bagnall and Worp). Coptic verso: since the two texts are different, can they be on the same Sosol number? Note that the text is from SB Kopt. III 1268 (and not the ed. pr.). It is ok since the text of SB Kopt. is a corrected version of the ed. pr. Line 1: there is an alternate reading proposed in the ed. pr. (and the SB Kopt.) -> <:*staurogram* ⲙⲟⲩⲛ|alt:|ⲁⲙⲟⲩⲛ:>. Line 1: the dots are middots -> ⲙⲟⲩⲛ *middot* ⲓⲥⲁⲕ *middot*. Line 2: the dots are middots (and add a middot between ⲧⲁⲕⲁⲡⲉ and ⲉ) and add a space between ⲁⲣⲓ and ⲧⲁⲕⲁⲡⲉ and there is a scribal correction (according to the SB Kopt.) -> 2.- ⲉⲓ *middot* ⲁⲣ ⲓ(¨) *middot* ⲧ<:ἀγάπη=grc|reg|<:ⲁⲕⲁ̣ⲡⲉ|subst|ⲁⲕⲙⲡⲉ:>:> *middot* ⲉ. Line 2-3: ⲉ3.- ϣⲁⲣⲉⲡⲁⲗⲟⲩ add a space between ⲉϣⲁⲣⲉ and ⲡⲁⲗⲟⲩ -> ⲉ3.- ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲁⲗⲟⲩ. Line 4: the dot is a middot: *middot*. Line 4: <:ⲡⲟⲛⲁϥ|alt:|ⲡⲟⲛ ⲛⲁϥ:>. Line 6: <:ⲁ ⲓ(¨)ⲥⲉⲃ7.- ⲉ|alt:|ⲁⲓⲥ¯ⲡ¯ⲥ or ⲁ<ⲣ>ⲓⲥ ⲉ<ⲧ>ⲃⲉ:> . Line 10: the SB Kopt. proposes a correction: <:ⲁ ⲡⲁⲩⲗⲟⲥ|alt:Hasitzka|<ⲁⲡ>ⲁ ⲡⲁⲩⲗⲟⲥ>. Line 13: .. -> .2.

div.ab:
Aὐρήλιος Πμοῦν Διδύμου ὑπὲρ κώμης Μελαιλαείδος
ὑπὲρ ιε ἰνδικτίωνος σίτου καθαροῦ ἀρτάβας ἑπτα, σίτου ἀρτάβας ζ, τὰ
προσχωρήσαντα εἰς ἐμβολήν. Ἀττίων στοιχεῖστυχῖ μοιμε
Φλάουιος Σαραπάμμων ἀκτουάριος μαρτυρῶ paraphe
